text: Facelina lugubris is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Facelina lugubris (Bergh, 1882). Accessed on 2018-02-17. ==Distribution== The type locality for this species is Trieste in the Adriatic Sea. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1882
title: Facelina lugubris
